scriptmodule.description: Checks some basic features of the quickview. Checks if the add-to-cart-button is disabled initially and is enabled after selecting color and size.

command.name: assertElementPresent
command.comment: Check for the disabled add to cart button.

command.name: waitForText
command.comment: Wait for the color title to appear next to the swatches.

command.name: assertNotElementPresent
command.comment: Check if no size is selected yet.

command.name: waitForElementPresent
command.comment: Check if size has been selected.

command.name: assertNotElementPresent
command.comment: Check for the enabled add to cart button.
